entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
